Package mpmToolbox.gui.syncPlayer

Class PlaybackRunnable

  • java.lang.Object
    • mpmToolbox.gui.syncPlayer.PlaybackRunnable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class PlaybackRunnable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class represents the Runnable instance that the thread is running when aligning the playback slider position with the music and switching off the play button at the end of the playback.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt
